Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.honton.chas</groupId>
  <artifactId>exists-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.4</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'org.honton.chas:exists-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:0.0.4'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="org.honton.chas" name="exists-maven-plugin" rev="0.0.4">
  <artifact name="exists-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='org.honton.chas', module='exists-maven-plugin', version='0.0.4')
)

Grails

compile 'org.honton.chas:exists-maven-plugin:0.0.4'

Leiningen

[org.honton.chas/exists-maven-plugin "0.0.4"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "org.honton.chas" % "exists-maven-plugin" % "0.0.4"
